subtitle: Full Stack Developer focused on building modern, high-performance web experiences
description-1: I'm a full stack developer with experience building modern web applications, dynamic interfaces, and scalable APIs. I specialize in the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem, working across both frontend and backend.
description-2: I focus on creating well-structured, fast and maintainable solutions, always prioritizing user experience and clean architecture.
description-3: I work primarily with React, Next.js, Node.js and Express, along with SQL and NoSQL databases. I also have experience with Java and Python for more specialized backend projects.
desc-strengths-1: I identify, analyze, and solve technical problems quickly and efficiently, even under pressure.
desc-strengths-2: I learn new technologies fast and apply them directly to real-world projects.
desc-strengths-3: I adapt well to teams, communicate clearly, and contribute to an efficient and productive workflow.
desc-strengths-4: I write clean, modular, and maintainable code following modern best practices and patterns.
